author: n3tsurge
description: This capability involves establishing the ability to find a file by its content pattern within a system or network. This includes implementing mechanisms to analyze and identify specific content patterns within files, ensuring that all files can be efficiently accessed and managed based on their content. It is essential for maintaining data integrity, facilitating quick access to necessary files, and enhancing overall operational efficiency by providing visibility into file contents within the organization.

requirements.description: Staff must be trained and qualified to perform this capability effectively.
Documented procedures and playbooks must be available for executing this capability.
File system access and forensic tools for file analysis and manipulation.

title: Establish Ability to Find File by Content Pattern

references.name: NIST SP 800-137: Information Security Continuous Monitoring (ISCM)
MITRE ATT&CK: Discovery Tactics and Detection Strategies
CISA Zero Trust Architecture - Monitoring and Analytics
